// print date -----------------------------
export function printDate(){var date=new Date();var day=date.getDate();var formattedDay=formateDay(day);var month=date.getMonth();var formattedMonth=formateMonth(month);var year=date.getFullYear();var currentDate="".concat(formattedDay," ").concat(formattedMonth," ").concat(year);function formateDay(day){var editedDay=day;if(day===1||day===21||day===31){editedDay+="st";}else if(day===2||day===22){editedDay+="nd";}else if(day===3||day===23){editedDay+="rd";}else{editedDay+="th";}return editedDay;}function formateMonth(monthIndex){var monthNames=["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"];return monthNames[monthIndex];}return currentDate;}
